Body.Content:
Introduction

We’re providing standard access to AI video generation in the Create experience of Microsoft 365 Copilot to users without a Microsoft 365 Copilot license, enabling all Copilot Chat users in your organization to generate AI-powered videos using curated stock content. This feature enables users to create videos using natural language and Word, PowerPoint, and PDF files to communicate their ideas.

Learn more about standard vs. priority access to Copilot features: Standard versus priority access to features in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat - Microsoft Support

When this will happen:

  • General availability (Web, Windows, macOS): Begins rolling out early November 2025 and is expected to complete by mid-November 2025.
  • General availability (Worldwide): Begins mid-November 2025 and is expected to complete by late November 2025.

How this affects your organization:

  • Who is affected: Microsoft 365 licensed users with access to Copilot Chat
  • What will happen:
    • Users will find a new option to create videos in the Create experience of the Microsoft 365 Copilot app.

    • Users can create a video using natural language and then edit the transcript and update the audio.
    • Videos are created using stock video and are fully editable. 
    • Supported input files:
      • Unencrypted DOCX, PPTX, and PDF formats
      • Files with sensitivity labels, as long as the label does not display a lock icon
    • No admin action is required to enable this feature.

What you can do to prepare:

  • Review your current settings in the Microsoft 365 admin center.
  • If needed, update your tenant configuration using this guide: Microsoft 365 admin center scenarios that configure Copilot | Microsoft Learn
  • Inform users about AI video creation capabilities: Get started with Microsoft 365 Copilot Create – Microsoft Support
  • Consider updating internal documentation or training materials to reflect this change.

Compliance considerations:

No compliance considerations identified, review as appropriate for your organization.
